name: Sally Gimon
what_you_do: Sally Gimon offers tax-saving strategies for US business owners, entrepreneurs, and 1099 income earners through the TaxShield Method and the Spendthrift Trust, aiming to significantly reduce their federal and state income taxes.
who_you_serve: Her target audience includes US business owners, entrepreneurs, and individuals earning 1099 income, particularly those making at least $100,000 gross annually.
current_projects: Free training on the TaxShield Method
bio: Saved 92% on federal income taxes for 2022, 2023, and 2024; testimonials of significant tax savings from clients.
business_focus: Sally Gimon offers tax-saving strategies for US business owners, entrepreneurs, and 1099 income earners through the TaxShield Method and the Spendthrift Trust, aiming to significantly reduce their federal and state income taxes. (tax savings)
